profile.title: Public Profile
profile.description: Allow access to your name and e-mail address

account.title: Account Access
account.description: Allow access to your account settings. Required to request or change backup schedules.

device.title: Cloud Connector
device.description: Potential access to all configured Things and Thing States. Fine tune access in your OHX installation.

addons.title: Addon Registry
addons.description: Allows adding, altering own Addon Registry entries.
